ygData.subject: Re: Appearance question
ygData.msgSnippet: All of my wood elf buddies (males) wearing silver plate legs, shin  greaves, steel plate, all of it looks rosy colored. The only exception was the female
ygData.messageBody:
All of my wood elf buddies (males) wearing silver plate legs, shin greaves,
steel plate, all of it looks rosy colored. The only exception was the female
merchant in Kelethin that looks VERY silver - no blue or rosy tinge. I'm
using voodoo3.

Sartori D'Elsiraad <The Companions>
Bard of Kelethin of the 50th Chorus
Veeshan



>An appearance question for all you steel plate wearing wood-elf males out
>there. What color is your steel plate tinged with? I am wearing the shin
>greaves, which I thought would look just like plate, but I have never seen
>anyone else with legs that are this color. They appear to be a rose tinged
>silvery hue on me and ever since I put them on I constantly get "XXXXXX is
>examining your equipment" or whatever that message is. The wood elf
>females
>I have seen in what looked like steel plate were blue tinged. Is this the
>normal appearance of steel plate on wood elves? If the rose color is
>normal
>then I guess I have never seen any wood elves in steel plate on E'ci.
>
> Kitasi
